verses.text: Then \w sang|strong="H7891"\w* \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* and \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abinoam|strong="H0042"\w* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Praise|strong="H1288"\w* ye the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for the \w avenging|strong="H6544"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* willingly \w offered|strong="H5068"\w* themselves.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O ye \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*; give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, O ye \w princes|strong="H7336"\w*; I, \add even\add* I, will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; I will \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* \add praise\add* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when thou wentest \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, when thou marchedst \w out|strong="H6805"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w trembled|strong="H7493"\w*, and the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w dropped|strong="H5197"\w*, the \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* also \w dropped|strong="H5197"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

The \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w melted|strong="H5140"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add even\add* that \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.  +  r 5.5  t melted: Heb. flowed *

In the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Shamgar|strong="H8044"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Anath|strong="H6067"\w*, in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jael|strong="H3278"\w*, the \w highways|strong="H0734"\w* were \w unoccupied|strong="H2308"\w*, and the \w travellers|strong="H1980"\w* \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* through \w byways|strong="H6128"\w*.\f + \fr 5.6 \ft travellers: Heb. walkers of paths\f*\f + \fr 5.6 \ft byways: Heb. crooked ways\f*

\add The inhabitants of\add* the \w villages|strong="H6520"\w* \w ceased|strong="H2308"\w*, they \w ceased|strong="H2308"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, until that I \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, that I \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* a \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

They \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*; then \add was\add* \w war|strong="H3901"\w* in the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*: was there a \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* or \w spear|strong="H7420"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* among \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

My \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* toward the \w governors|strong="H2710"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that offered themselves \w willingly|strong="H5068"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* ye the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Speak|strong="H7878"\w*, ye that \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* on \w white|strong="H6715"\w* \w asses|strong="H0860"\w*, ye that \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H4055"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 5.10 \ft Speak: or, Meditate\f*

\add They that are delivered\add* from the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of \w archers|strong="H2686"\w* in the places of drawing \w water|strong="H4857"\w*, there shall they \w rehearse|strong="H8567"\w* the righteous \w acts|strong="H6666"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add even\add* the righteous \w acts|strong="H6666"\w* \add toward the inhabitants\add* of his \w villages|strong="H6520"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: then shall the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.  +  r 5.11  t righteous…: Heb. righteousnesses *

\w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w*: \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w utter|strong="H1696"\w* a \w song|strong="H7892"\w*: \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w*, and lead thy \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* \w captive|strong="H7617"\w*, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abinoam|strong="H0042"\w*.

Then he made him that \w remaineth|strong="H8300"\w* have \w dominion|strong="H7287"\w* over the \w nobles|strong="H0117"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made me have \w dominion|strong="H7287"\w* over the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*.

Out of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add was there\add* a \w root|strong="H8328"\w* of them against \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*; \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee, \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, among thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; out of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w governors|strong="H2710"\w*, and out of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* they that \w handle|strong="H4900"\w* the \w pen|strong="H7626"\w* of the \w writer|strong="H5608"\w*.\f + \fr 5.14 \ft handle: Heb. draw with\f*

And the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* \add were\add* with \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w*; even \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, and also \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w*: he was \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* on \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* into the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*. For the \w divisions|strong="H6390"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \add there were\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H2711"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 5.15 \ft foot: Heb. his feet\f*\f + \fr 5.15 \ft thoughts: Heb. impressions\f*\f + \fr 5.15 \ft For: or, In\f*

Why \w abodest|strong="H3427"\w* thou \w among|strong="H0996"\w* the \w sheepfolds|strong="H4942"\w*, to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w bleatings|strong="H8292"\w* of the \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w*? For the \w divisions|strong="H6390"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \add there were\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w searchings|strong="H2714"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 5.16 \ft For: or, In\f*

\w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w abode|strong="H7931"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: and why did \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w remain|strong="H1481"\w* in \w ships|strong="H0591"\w*? \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* \w continued|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shore|strong="H2348"\w*, and \w abode|strong="H7931"\w* in his \w breaches|strong="H4664"\w*.\f + \fr 5.17 \ft shore: or, port\f*\f + \fr 5.17 \ft breaches: or, creeks\f*

\w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* and \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* \add were\add* a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that\add* \w jeoparded|strong="H2778"\w* their \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* unto the \w death|strong="H4191"\w* in the high \w places|strong="H4791"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.\f + \fr 5.18 \ft jeoparded: Heb. exposed to reproach\f*

The \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \add and\add* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w*, then \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* in \w Taanach|strong="H8590"\w* by the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*; they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* no \w gain|strong="H1215"\w* of \w money|strong="H3701"\w*.

They \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* in their \w courses|strong="H4546"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*.\f + \fr 5.20 \ft courses: Heb. paths\f*

The \w river|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Kishon|strong="H7028"\w* swept them \w away|strong="H1640"\w*, that \w ancient|strong="H6917"\w* \w river|strong="H5158"\w*, the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kishon|strong="H7028"\w*. O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, thou hast trodden \w down|strong="H1869"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*.

Then were the \w horsehoofs|strong="H6119"\w* \w broken|strong="H1986"\w* by the means of the \w pransings|strong="H1726"\w*, the \w pransings|strong="H1726"\w* of their mighty \w ones|strong="H0047"\w*.\f + \fr 5.22 \ft pransings: or, tramplings, or, plungings\f*

\w Curse|strong="H0779"\w* ye \w Meroz|strong="H4789"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* ye \w bitterly|strong="H0779"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof; because they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* not to the \w help|strong="H5833"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to the \w help|strong="H5833"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* against the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* above \w women|strong="H0802"\w* shall \w Jael|strong="H3278"\w* the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w* the \w Kenite|strong="H7017"\w* be, \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* shall she be above \w women|strong="H0802"\w* in the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*.

He \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \add and\add* she \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \add him\add* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*; she brought \w forth|strong="H7126"\w* \w butter|strong="H2529"\w* in a \w lordly|strong="H0117"\w* \w dish|strong="H5602"\w*.

She \w put|strong="H7971"\w* her \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to the \w nail|strong="H3489"\w*, and her right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* to the \w workmen’s|strong="H6001"\w* \w hammer|strong="H1989"\w*; and with the hammer she \w smote|strong="H1986"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, she smote \w off|strong="H4277"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, when she had \w pierced|strong="H4272"\w* and stricken \w through|strong="H2498"\w* his \w temples|strong="H7541"\w*.\f + \fr 5.26 \ft with…: Heb. she hammered\f*

At her \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* he \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w*, he \w fell|strong="H5307"\w*, he lay \w down|strong="H7901"\w*: at her \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* he \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w*, he \w fell|strong="H5307"\w*: \w where|strong="H0834"\w* he \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w*, there he fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w dead|strong="H7703"\w*.\f + \fr 5.27 \ft At: Heb. Between\f*\f + \fr 5.27 \ft dead: Heb. destroyed\f*

The \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* of \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w looked|strong="H8259"\w* out at a \w window|strong="H2474"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H2980"\w* through the \w lattice|strong="H0822"\w*, Why is his \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \add so\add* \w long|strong="H0954"\w* in \w coming|strong="H0935"\w*? why \w tarry|strong="H0309"\w* the \w wheels|strong="H6471"\w* of his \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w*?

Her \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w ladies|strong="H8282"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* her, yea, she \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w answer|strong="H0561"\w* to herself,\f + \fr 5.29 \ft answer: Heb. her words\f*

Have they not \w sped|strong="H4672"\w*? have they \add not\add* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* the \w prey|strong="H7998"\w*; to \w every|strong="H7218"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* a \w damsel|strong="H7356"\w* \add or\add* \w two|strong="H7361"\w*; to \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* a \w prey|strong="H7998"\w* of divers \w colours|strong="H6648"\w*, a \w prey|strong="H7998"\w* of divers \w colours|strong="H6648"\w* of \w needlework|strong="H7553"\w*, of divers \w colours|strong="H6648"\w* of needlework on both \w sides|strong="H7553"\w*, \add meet\add* for the \w necks|strong="H6677"\w* of \add them that take\add* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*?\f + \fr 5.30 \ft every…: Heb. the head of a man\f*

So let all thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but \add let\add* them that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* him \add be\add* as the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* when he goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* in his \w might|strong="H1369"\w*. And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* had \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.
